message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we settle at $11,200?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $10,900?
